title: VueDo
description: My first Vue.js project, a simple to do list with the ability to add, complete and delete tasks.

title: Vue-Giphy
description: A Vue application that retrieves and displays Gifs from the Giphy API. The application allows the user to view trending gifs, select a random gif or search a gif by name.

title: A Vue of the World
description: A college assignment using Vue, retrieves and display information from the REST Countries API. The user can search for information on countries from around the world.

title: College Vue
description: A college assignment using Vue. A user has full CRUD capabailites by sending and receiving various infomation about lecturers, courses and enrolements via a College API.

title: Space Escape
description: A video game 'Space Escape' created using the Javascript games engine Phaser. This was a college assignment which was completed over a period of 6 weeks.

title: Film Finder (Flutter)
description: A Flutter app that will take in a user's input and search the movie database API for a film with a matching title. The app has built in error checking in case a result is not found.

title: P5 Pool
description: A college assignment were the task was to create an animation by implementating mathematical equations into a programme using the p5 JavaScript library.

title: Film Finder (Kotlin)
description: The Film Finder App revisited as part of a college assignment. Rewritten from scratch using kotlin, with added functionality such as the ability to add films to a watchlist.

title: Incredible Instruments
description: A website for a store that sells musical instruments built with HTML and CSS. Has full manager and customer CRUD functionality. Product information stored and retrieved from a local database using PHP.

title: Weather App
description: A weather app built with flutter. The app takes in a user's location and uses it along with the Open Weather Map API to retrieve weather information and displays the current weather for the area
